import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './tradeblock.css' const TBteamExpand = (props) => { //props const shares = props.shares const user = props.user const t = props.t //States const [paidForShares, setPaidForShares] = useState(0) const [winPayoutsValue, setWinPayoutsValue] = useState(0) return(
Offers To Buy
2 x $31.00
4 x $30.50
1 x $28.92
5 x $26.00
Offers To Sell
7 x $32.33
2 x $34.34
4 x $35.00
3 x $35.60
3 x $37.00
{/*
Your Position
Shares: 12
Avg Cost: $30.69
Value: $390.00
Portfolio Diversity: 1.26%
Share Return
$21.72 [ 5.90% ]
Win Payout Returm
$9.60 [ 2.61% ]
Total Return
$31.32 [ 8.50% ]
*/}
Stats
52 Week High
${t.yearHigh.toFixed(2)}
52 Week Low
${t.yearLow.toFixed(2)}
52 Week Payout
${t.league = 'NBA' ? (t.wins * 0.10).toFixed(2) : (t.wins * 0.50).toFixed(2)}
Team Cap
${(t.sharesOutstanding * t.lastSoldPrice).toFixed(2)}
Price/Wins
{(t.lastSoldPrice / t.wins).toFixed(2)}
Win Payout %
{t.league = 'NBA' ? ((0.10 / t.lastSoldPrice)*100).toFixed(2) : ((0.50 / t.lastSoldPrice)*100).toFixed(2)}%
) } export default TBteamExpand
